roadmaps.name: Software Engineering
roadmaps.description: Just getting started with software engineering? Then this roadmap is maybe for you.

roadmaps.name: Think Frontend
roadmaps.description: Everything about frontend development. Get started with getting to know more about browsers, common tools and some terminology. Move on to the languages of the web and more.

roadmaps.name: Backend 101
roadmaps.description: How data is saved, common backend design patterns, severs, and more.

roadmaps.name: Languages of the Web
roadmaps.description: The big three languages that power most of the internet. HTML, CSS and JavaScript. Take a deep dive in this roadmap.

roadmaps.name: SEO
roadmaps.description: What good would websites be if no one could ever find them? In this roadmap, we explore how users can find what they are looking for on the WWW.

roadmaps.name: Head-first DevOps
roadmaps.description: More on what is commonly known as DevOps. A job role that is a mix of development & IT-operations.
